amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds by the Secretary to pay performance awards under specified conditions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds by the Secretary to pay performance awards under specified conditions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
